17namespace v8 {
18
19namespace {
20std::shared_ptr<AsyncHooksWrap> UnwrapHook(
21 const v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value>& info) {
22 DCHECK(i::ValidateCallbackInfo(info));
23 v8::Isolate* v8_isolate = info.GetIsolate();
24 HandleScope scope(v8_isolate);
25 Local<Object> hook = info.This();
26
27 AsyncHooks* hooks = PerIsolateData::Get(v8_isolate)->GetAsyncHooks();
28
29 if (!hooks->async_hook_ctor.Get(v8_isolate)->HasInstance(hook)) {
30 v8_isolate->ThrowError(
31 "Invalid 'this' passed instead of AsyncHooks instance");
32 return nullptr;
33 }
34
35 i::Handle<i::Object> handle = Utils::OpenHandle(*hook->GetInternalField(0));
36 return i::Handle<i::Managed<AsyncHooksWrap>>::cast(handle)->get();
37}
38
39void EnableHook(const v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value>& info) {
40 DCHECK(i::ValidateCallbackInfo(info));
41 auto wrap = UnwrapHook(info);
42 if (wrap) wrap->Enable();
43}
44
45void DisableHook(const v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value>& info) {
46 DCHECK(i::ValidateCallbackInfo(info));
47 auto wrap = UnwrapHook(info);
48 if (wrap) wrap->Disable();
49}
50
51} // namespace
52
53AsyncHooks::AsyncHooks(v8::Isolate* v8_isolate) : v8_isolate_(v8_isolate) {
54 AsyncContext ctx;
55 ctx.execution_async_id = 1;
56 ctx.trigger_async_id = 0;
57 asyncContexts.push(ctx);
58 current_async_id = 1;
59
60 HandleScope handle_scope(v8_isolate_);
61
62 async_hook_ctor.Reset(v8_isolate_, FunctionTemplate::New(v8_isolate_));
63 async_hook_ctor.Get(v8_isolate_)
64 ->SetClassName(String::NewFromUtf8Literal(v8_isolate_, "AsyncHook"));
65
66 async_hooks_templ.Reset(v8_isolate_,
67 async_hook_ctor.Get(v8_isolate_)->InstanceTemplate());
68 async_hooks_templ.Get(v8_isolate_)->SetInternalFieldCount(1);
69 async_hooks_templ.Get(v8_isolate_)
70 ->Set(v8_isolate_, "enable",
71 FunctionTemplate::New(v8_isolate_, EnableHook));
72 async_hooks_templ.Get(v8_isolate_)
73 ->Set(v8_isolate_, "disable",
74 FunctionTemplate::New(v8_isolate_, DisableHook));
75
76 async_id_symbol.Reset(v8_isolate_, Private::New(v8_isolate_));
77 trigger_id_symbol.Reset(v8_isolate_, Private::New(v8_isolate_));
78
79 v8_isolate_->SetPromiseHook(ShellPromiseHook);
80}
81
82AsyncHooks::~AsyncHooks() {
83 v8_isolate_->SetPromiseHook(nullptr);
84 async_wraps_.clear();
85}
86
87void AsyncHooksWrap::Enable() { enabled_ = true; }
88
89void AsyncHooksWrap::Disable() { enabled_ = false; }
90
91v8::Local<v8::Function> AsyncHooksWrap::init_function() const {
92 return init_function_.Get(isolate_);
93}
94void AsyncHooksWrap::set_init_function(v8::Local<v8::Function> value) {
95 init_function_.Reset(isolate_, value);
96}
97v8::Local<v8::Function> AsyncHooksWrap::before_function() const {
98 return before_function_.Get(isolate_);
99}
100void AsyncHooksWrap::set_before_function(v8::Local<v8::Function> value) {
101 before_function_.Reset(isolate_, value);
102}
103v8::Local<v8::Function> AsyncHooksWrap::after_function() const {
104 return after_function_.Get(isolate_);
105}
106void AsyncHooksWrap::set_after_function(v8::Local<v8::Function> value) {
107 after_function_.Reset(isolate_, value);
108}
109v8::Local<v8::Function> AsyncHooksWrap::promiseResolve_function() const {
110 return promiseResolve_function_.Get(isolate_);
111}
112void AsyncHooksWrap::set_promiseResolve_function(
113 v8::Local<v8::Function> value) {
114 promiseResolve_function_.Reset(isolate_, value);
115}
116
117async_id_t AsyncHooks::GetExecutionAsyncId() const {
118 return asyncContexts.top().execution_async_id;
119}
120
121async_id_t AsyncHooks::GetTriggerAsyncId() const {
122 return asyncContexts.top().trigger_async_id;
123}
124
125Local<Object> AsyncHooks::CreateHook(
126 const v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value>& info) {
127 DCHECK(i::ValidateCallbackInfo(info));
128 v8::Isolate* v8_isolate = info.GetIsolate();
129 EscapableHandleScope handle_scope(v8_isolate);
130
131 if (v8_isolate->IsExecutionTerminating()) {
132 return Local<Object>();
133 }
134
135 Local<Context> currentContext = v8_isolate->GetCurrentContext();
136
137 if (info.Length() != 1 || !info[0]->IsObject()) {
138 v8_isolate->ThrowError("Invalid arguments passed to createHook");
139 return Local<Object>();
140 }
141
142 std::shared_ptr<AsyncHooksWrap> wrap =
143 std::make_shared<AsyncHooksWrap>(v8_isolate);
144
145 Local<Object> fn_obj = info[0].As<Object>();
146
147 v8::TryCatch try_catch(v8_isolate);
148#define SET_HOOK_FN(name) \
149 MaybeLocal<Value> name##_maybe_func = fn_obj->Get( \
150 currentContext, String::NewFromUtf8Literal(v8_isolate, #name)); \
151 Local<Value> name##_func; \
152 if (name##_maybe_func.ToLocal(&name##_func) && name##_func->IsFunction()) { \
153 wrap->set_##name##_function(name##_func.As<Function>()); \
154 } else { \
155 try_catch.ReThrow(); \
156 }
157
158 SET_HOOK_FN(init);
159 SET_HOOK_FN(before);
160 SET_HOOK_FN(after);
161 SET_HOOK_FN(promiseResolve);
162#undef SET_HOOK_FN
163
164 Local<Object> obj = async_hooks_templ.Get(v8_isolate)
165 ->NewInstance(currentContext)
166 .ToLocalChecked();
167 i::Handle<i::Object> managed = i::Managed<AsyncHooksWrap>::FromSharedPtr(
168 reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(v8_isolate), sizeof(AsyncHooksWrap), wrap);
169 obj->SetInternalField(0, Utils::ToLocal(managed));
170
171 async_wraps_.push_back(std::move(wrap));
172
173 return handle_scope.Escape(obj);
174}
175
176void AsyncHooks::ShellPromiseHook(PromiseHookType type, Local<Promise> promise,
177 Local<Value> parent) {
178 v8::Isolate* v8_isolate = promise->GetIsolate();
179 AsyncHooks* hooks = PerIsolateData::Get(v8_isolate)->GetAsyncHooks();
180 if (v8_isolate->IsExecutionTerminating() || hooks->skip_after_termination_) {
181 hooks->skip_after_termination_ = true;
182 return;
183 }
184 i::Isolate* i_isolate = reinterpret_cast<i::Isolate*>(v8_isolate);
185
186 HandleScope handle_scope(v8_isolate);
187 i::Handle<i::Object> exception;
188 // Keep track of any previously thrown exception.
189 if (i_isolate->has_exception()) {
190 exception = handle(i_isolate->exception(), i_isolate);
191 }
192 {
193 TryCatch try_catch(v8_isolate);
194 try_catch.SetVerbose(true);
195
196 Local<Context> currentContext = v8_isolate->GetCurrentContext();
197 DCHECK(!currentContext.IsEmpty());
198
199 if (type == PromiseHookType::kInit) {
200 ++hooks->current_async_id;
201 Local<Integer> async_id =
202 Integer::New(v8_isolate, hooks->current_async_id);
203 CHECK(!promise
204 ->HasPrivate(currentContext,
205 hooks->async_id_symbol.Get(v8_isolate))
206 .ToChecked());
207 promise->SetPrivate(currentContext,
208 hooks->async_id_symbol.Get(v8_isolate), async_id);
209
210 if (parent->IsPromise()) {
211 Local<Promise> parent_promise = parent.As<Promise>();
212 Local<Value> parent_async_id =
213 parent_promise
214 ->GetPrivate(currentContext,
215 hooks->async_id_symbol.Get(v8_isolate))
216 .ToLocalChecked();
217 promise->SetPrivate(currentContext,
218 hooks->trigger_id_symbol.Get(v8_isolate),
219 parent_async_id);
220 } else {
221 CHECK(parent->IsUndefined());
222 promise->SetPrivate(currentContext,
223 hooks->trigger_id_symbol.Get(v8_isolate),
224 Integer::New(v8_isolate, 0));
225 }
226 } else if (type == PromiseHookType::kBefore) {
227 AsyncContext ctx;
228 ctx.execution_async_id =
229 promise
230 ->GetPrivate(currentContext,
231 hooks->async_id_symbol.Get(v8_isolate))
232 .ToLocalChecked()
233 .As<Integer>()
234 ->Value();
235 ctx.trigger_async_id =
236 promise
237 ->GetPrivate(currentContext,
238 hooks->trigger_id_symbol.Get(v8_isolate))
239 .ToLocalChecked()
240 .As<Integer>()
241 ->Value();
242 hooks->asyncContexts.push(ctx);
243 } else if (type == PromiseHookType::kAfter) {
244 hooks->asyncContexts.pop();
245 }
246 if (!i::StackLimitCheck{i_isolate}.HasOverflowed()) {
247 for (size_t i = 0; i < hooks->async_wraps_.size(); ++i) {
248 std::shared_ptr<AsyncHooksWrap> wrap = hooks->async_wraps_[i];
249 PromiseHookDispatch(type, promise, parent, *wrap, hooks);
250 if (try_catch.HasCaught()) break;
251 }
252 if (try_catch.HasCaught()) Shell::ReportException(v8_isolate, try_catch);
253 }
254 }
255 if (!exception.is_null()) {
256 i_isolate->set_exception(*exception);
257 }
258}
259
260void AsyncHooks::PromiseHookDispatch(PromiseHookType type,
261 Local<Promise> promise,
262 Local<Value> parent,
263 const AsyncHooksWrap& wrap,
264 AsyncHooks* hooks) {
265 if (!wrap.IsEnabled()) return;
266 v8::Isolate* v8_isolate = hooks->v8_isolate_;
267 if (v8_isolate->IsExecutionTerminating()) return;
268 HandleScope handle_scope(v8_isolate);
269
270 Local<Value> rcv = Undefined(v8_isolate);
271 Local<Context> context = v8_isolate->GetCurrentContext();
272 Local<Value> async_id =
273 promise->GetPrivate(context, hooks->async_id_symbol.Get(v8_isolate))
274 .ToLocalChecked();
275 Local<Value> args[1] = {async_id};
276
277 switch (type) {
278 case PromiseHookType::kInit:
279 if (!wrap.init_function().IsEmpty()) {
280 Local<Value> initArgs[4] = {
281 async_id, String::NewFromUtf8Literal(v8_isolate, "PROMISE"),
282 promise
283 ->GetPrivate(context, hooks->trigger_id_symbol.Get(v8_isolate))
284 .ToLocalChecked(),
285 promise};
286 USE(wrap.init_function()->Call(context, rcv, 4, initArgs));
287 }
288 break;
289 case PromiseHookType::kBefore:
290 if (!wrap.before_function().IsEmpty()) {
291 USE(wrap.before_function()->Call(context, rcv, 1, args));
292 }
293 break;
294 case PromiseHookType::kAfter:
295 if (!wrap.after_function().IsEmpty()) {
296 USE(wrap.after_function()->Call(context, rcv, 1, args));
297 }
298 break;
299 case PromiseHookType::kResolve:
300 if (!wrap.promiseResolve_function().IsEmpty()) {
301 USE(wrap.promiseResolve_function()->Call(context, rcv, 1, args));
302 }
303 }
304}
